data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Necaxa.
Free kick Necaxa.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 5, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Angel Zaldivar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 6, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Zapopan to check on Alex Zendejas, who is grimacing with pain.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 9, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Zendejas for Necaxa is back on the field again.
In Zapopan Guadalajara drive forward through Fernando Beltran. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 11, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Necaxa throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
In the minute 13, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Guadalajara are pushing forward but Angel Zaldivar's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Guadalajara's Jesus Molina misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Jesus Molina has been booked in Zapopan.
Attention is being given to Necaxaâ€™s Juan Delgado and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 22, Ian Gonzalez of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Juan Delgado is back on his feet again.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 25, Angel Zaldivar for Guadalajara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Necaxa.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Hiram Mier (Guadalajara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 33, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Akron.
In Zapopan, Uriel Antuna of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 36, Guadalajara's Uriel Antuna gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Guadalajara's Jesus Molina is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 42, Gilberto Sepulveda Lopez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Jesus Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Akron.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Estadio Akron.
Necaxa make their first substitution with Maximiliano Salas replacing Alex Zendejas.
In the minute 46, Mario De Luna is replacing Jair Pereira for the away team.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Isaac Brizuela of Guadalajara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 54, Goal! Guadalajara have got their heads in front thanks to a Jesus Angulo strike.
Angel Zaldivar with an assist there.
Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
In the minute 56, Can Guadalajara capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joao Rodriguez is replacing Ian Gonzalez for Necaxa at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Guadalajara.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Joao Rodriguez (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
In the minute 66, Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Necaxa.
Claudio Baeza is booked for the away team.
In the minute 69, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Necaxa.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 73, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
The away team replace David Cabrera with Fernando Arce.
Yerko Leiva is on a sub for Claudio Baeza for Necaxa.
In the minute 74, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 78, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Unai Bilbao for Necaxa has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
In the minute 82, Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a first substitution, with Alan Torres replacing Angel Zaldivar.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Lucas Passerini (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Antonio Briseno is replacing Jesus Molina for the home team.
In the minute 85, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
At Estadio Akron, Yerko Leiva has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Guadalajara.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In Zapopan Necaxa attack through Yerko Leiva. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
Necaxa drive forward but Angel Malagon is judged offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
The home team replace Fernando Beltran with Cristian Calderon.
Ronaldo Cisneros is on a sub for Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara.
Raul Gudino (Guadalajara) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
